quote_first: And the whole house seemed resounding with his shouts. When it was
quote_time_case: ten or fifteen minutes to two
quote_last: the deacon would come in; he was a lanky young man of twenty-two, with long hair, with no beard and a hardly perceptible moustache. Going into the drawing-room, he crossed himself before the ikon, smiled, and held out his hand to Von Koren. 'Good-morning,' the zoologist said coldly. 'Where have you been?'
title: The Duel
author: Anton Pavlovich Chekhov
